Class XMLFileReader

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.persistency.reader.XMLFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileReader
public class XMLFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileReader
"Composite". reading map files and saved game files from XML. representing the current game state in order for the player to resume games.
